entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:07 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:07 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:07 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
